title: You Can't Shoe a Horse Fly

sources.title: You Can't Shoe a Horse Fly (1940)
sources.description: Hunky and Spunky are settling in for a nap, but a horse fly sees them and sees dinner. After battling the fly for a while, the youngster enlists dad's help. But the fly is merely stunned, and rallies a new attack, this time with friends. Father eventually kills the lot of them. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/you-cant-shoe-a-horse-fly-1940/

metadata.Plot: Hunky and Spunky are settling in for a nap, but a horse fly sees them and sees dinner. After battling the fly for a while, the youngster enlists dad's help. But the fly is merely stunned, and rallies a new attack, this time with friends. Father eventually kills the lot of them.
